abstract: Independent Internet radio services are arguing with record labels over royalty fees, but simulcasters and public radio stations have reached deals.
snippet: Independent Internet radio services are arguing with record labels over royalty fees, but simulcasters and public radio stations have reached deals.
lead_paragraph: Updated 8:40 p.m.: Clarified Corporation for Public Broadcasting rates and the simulcaster agreement.

headline.main: Still No Royalty Deal for Streaming Music Sites
